title: Apply TODAY and Move in TOMORROW!!!
posting_body: Welcome Home to Heights on Huron Apartment Homes

Welcome to Heights on Huron, an Avanti Residential Community - where you will find inviting and spacious one- and two-bedroom apartments for rent in Northglenn, CO that offer stunning views of the surrounding area.
Our homes come fully equipped with designer kitchens that open to a cozy living space that is great for hosting guests for dinner and movie nights.
Central air conditioning and ceiling fans will keep you cool throughout the summer months, and spacious walk-in closets will help keep you organized.
Our pet-friendly policy welcomes both you and your furry friends because we know they are an important member of your household.

Just outside our charming Northglenn, Colorado apartments, you will find swimming pools with accompanying sundeck lounge areas, on-site laundry, and an abundance of green space where you can picnic, read a book, and take in stunning views of the Croke Reservoir, all right in our backyard.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 595 Sq.
- Lake and Mountain Views From Select Apartment Homes
- Online Rent Payment and Maintenance Requests via Resident App
We are a pet friendly community.

Cats and dogs are welcome up to a limit of 2 per apartment home, however the following breeds are restricted: American Staffordshire Terriers, Staffordshire Bull Terriers, Rottweilers, Cane Corso, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Wolf Hybrids.
Proof of spay or neuter and up to date vaccines are required for pet approval.
